title: An Elegiack acrostick upon the reverend, learned, and much to be lamented Mr. Joseph Caryl, late minister of the Gospel at St. Magnus London-bridge he departed this life Thursday, February the 13th, 1672.
notes: Also includes: An epitaph on the reverend, worthy, pious and elaborate divine, Mr. Joseph Caryl.
Within mourning border, with emblems and motto at head.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
